document_data.name: Rorstil Hallowdant
document_data.mainbody: '''Rorstil Hallowdant''' was the High Steward of King [[Foril Obarskyr I]] of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Personality: The man was lazy and given to drinking heavily.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|33|4}} Per [[Joreld Nurennanthur]], he was given to saying "that's a matter of some dispute".{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|139|15}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Mirt]] seemed to think he could sneak in [[Amarune Whitewave]] and Storm Silverhand into Castle Obarskyr claiming they were exotic dancers for Hallowdant.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|213|23}}
